data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zong, Le, Qiu, Tengfei, Liu, Haoyu (2017): Description of two new species of the genus Pentacentrus Saussure from China (Orthoptera: Gryllidae). Zootaxa 4311 (1): 145-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4311.1.11|4 occurrences
